TopicTitle: Thank you everyone on the KSP team!

Articles.Content: I know you guys probably get quite a few thank you's from people, but just to make sure I want to give you a big THANK YOU because I know you are doing your absolute best to provide a better game, and a better community for everyone here even though people get impatient and demanding, you guys always try to give it your best and provide it in a timely and professional manor. Once again thank you for everything, and anything to come!
There's already a sticky thread that says exactly this :l
Well I wanted to make my own.
This thread is a bit unnecessary. I understand you wanting to make your own, I've felt the urge to create one several times myself, but there is already a sticky thread where you can thank them.
